deCONZ LXC

deCONZ is a software for managing and controlling Zigbee-based smart home devices. It allows for setting up, configuring and visualizing the status of connected devices, as well as for triggering actions and automations. It works as a bridge between the Zigbee network and other home automation systems and can be used as a standalone solution or integrated into existing setups.

ðŸ›ˆ If the LXC is created Privileged, the script will automatically set up USB passthrough.

To create a new Proxmox VE deCONZ LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.

  bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/deconz.sh)"

âš¡ Default Settings: 1GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU - Privileged âš¡

deCONZ Interface: IP:80
